Articles.Content:
Hello!

I am starting a new mod called Hybrid Propulsion Systems, and I'm wondering if I wrote these configs correctly. 

They are supposed to create an engine fueled by solid fuel and oxidizer, at a ratio of 0.8 to 1.2.

Github link: https://github.com/BenjaminCronin/Hybrid-Propulsion-Systems/blob/master/GameData/Hybrid Propulsion Systems/Parts/Engine/hybridEngineScrewdriver/screwdriver.cfg

Thanks!
Looks decent, but the best test is just trying it out ingame. Even if you don't have a model yet, you can just use the stock assets as a placeholder.

Yeah, I was doing that with my other mod also. 

Thanks for looking over it!
